lines.text: Give me back my attendance records.
No way, Dog Breath.
Mr. Lippman! Mr.Sitcurse...

[shouts]
Liar, liar! Pants on fire!
Stop it, Mr.Teensy. Holding your breath will not do you any good. Your not getting a raise.
But I want a raise.
[shouts]
I want a raise! I want a raise! I want a raise! I want a raise! I want a raise!
[throws a temper tantrum]

[shouts]
If you don't shut up,
[turns Mr.Teensy around]
I'm gonna grab your undies and give you a big...
[stops as Alex walks into Teachers lounge]

[to Mr. Teensy]
Gee, I guess that verterbrae is now back in place, huh, Mr. Teensy?
[Merv and Lippy have become exchange students]
[to Lippy who's written "Merv bites" on his locker]
Caught you, Freshman.
But, Mr. Merv I was....
You've got some explaining to do.
[puts a handcuff on Lippy and takes him to the office]
